section.name: Ben Hui's BlueChat MIDlet
section.p: The BlueChat MIDlet from Ben Hui was used as a reference model and starting point in the development of the Jadabs Bluetooth Transport Layer. The BlueChat application was integrated into the Jadabs-CLDC source for educational purpose. The BlueChat MIDlet can easily be build using the Maven-Antenna-Plugin.
Apart from some package renaming Ben Hui's code was not altered. Therfore the BlueChat application from the Jadabs-CLDC does not use Jadabs, JXME or the JXME-Bluetooth-Layer; it is self consistent.
